__e: {pos(192,180)}It's none of my business, but isn't a guy {pos(192,180)}who can't speak in front of women gonna hold you back a little?
I'm just imagining you not being able to talk, or feed yourself, or even...
I've never heard the term before, but it denote the inability to speak.
You're not the only one who assumed I was incapable of doing something nice.
Cos any place that calls itself a teen centre is probably full of people who can't make friends.
You could do something that I couldn't do.
She should be kind, patient, and most important, unable to imagine life without me by 10:00 tonight.
But, you know, he's physically incapable of lying or being cruel so I do worry about him, almost as much as I worry about you... you know who.
Now, your mother, she is an amazing person, and she loves you very much, but she's completely and utterly incapable of getting tough with you and telling you the things that you need to hear.
I'm happy that I got no talent, for because of that I'm honest and pure before God!
You don't lack talent. I just can't do it with you any more.
And if he tells you you're bad-- That forever.
